text: Costa del Este is a Panamanian football club based in Panama City, that currently plays in Liga Panameña de Fútbol. It takes its name from the real estate development in the township of Juan Díaz, Panama City. == History == Since its inception in 2008 and until 2014, the club was based in La Chorrera and known as Santos FC. Under new ownership the team had a perfect season winning the 2017-18 Liga Nacional de Ascenso Apertura and Clausura tournaments and gaining direct promotion to Liga Panameña de Fútbol. The winning streak continued during the 2018-19 Liga Panameña de Fútbol Apertura tournament reaching to the title game against Tauro FC losing the match 1-2. == Honors == *Liga Panameña de Fútbol: 1 appearance ::2018-19 : Apertura Runner Up *Liga Nacional de Ascenso: 5 appearances ::2017-18 : Winners - Promoted *Copa Rommel Fernández: 1 appearance ::2012 : Winners - Promoted (as Santos FC) == Kit history == === Jersey Suppliers === {| class="sortable" cellpadding="4" border="1" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; Background: #f9f9f9; LightSkyGreen: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%;" width="170" !Períod !Supplier |- |2014-2015 |Adidas Logo |- |2015-2017 |Keuka Logo |- |2017 |Puma brand |- |2018 | Umbro (brand) |- |2019 - 2021 |Puma brand |} == Players == === Current squad === == Non-playing staff == === Board of directors === {| class="wikitable" |- !
